title: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Facial Lotion, 3.38 Ounce
description: This luxiourious daily lotion provides superior moisturization in a lightweight, non-greasy formula. Antioxidants and emollient milk proteins work in conjunction with natural Cocoa and Shea butters to leave soft, smooth and radiant without irritation. Added SPF 15 broad spectrum sunscreen.

title: L'Oreal Paris Go 360 Clean, Deep Facial Cleanser, 6-Fluid Ounce
description: Go 360° Clean offers a complete range of four expertly formulated, high-foam cleansers that are perfectly calibrated to perform with the Scrublet™. The Deep Facial Cleanser is a deep-cleaning, high-foam gel, which unclogs pores as it removes oil, dirt and makeup. With notes of naranji, orange flower and mint for a refreshing fragrance and feel on skin, the gel formula helps reduce oily areas, dry skin patches and blemishes with its deep cleaning, pore-by-pore action. Oil-Free. Also, try the cleanser in an Exfoliating Scrub, Lotion or Cream formula. Benefits. Smaller pores: Go 360° Clean shrinks the appearance of pore size and refinishes the skin’s surface to reveal skin with more clarity. Deeper cleansing: Unique formulas reach down deeper to every last pore for a deep, deep clean. Keeps pores clean day after day. Softer skin: Sweeps away dead skin cells for an extraordinary softening and smoothing effect. Easy-to-use: Scrublet™ cleanses pore-by-pore with a fuss-free cleansing process.
